name: Hitchhike
description:
Note: The game requires two players to play. 

A competitive two-player game about hitchhiking from car to car across a variety of bridges and cars. 

When the red/blue arrow is lined up with the car randomly chosen for you (red for player 1, blue for player 2), simply Hitchhike (jump) across! Wrong Hitches (jumping onto the wrong car) gets you eliminated. Last player remaining wins. 

Controls- 

Player 1: 

Space to Hitchhike (jump)

Red arrow to aim

Player 2: 

Right Shift to Hitchhike (jump)

Blue arrow to aim
